attributes.action: To instruct DEFRA not to sell the National Fruit Collection and that it Remains at Brogdale
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The collection has been at Brogdale for over 50 years, and is very successful in maintaining and improving the number and variety of trees in the collection for the benefit of the nation and the community

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
